A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is one of the worst films I've ever seen. The director/writer appears to be trolling the audience daring you to get up and walk out.  As a stand alone movie it would be bad\, straight to DVD.  As the eighth instalment in a franchise it is bizarre. I had concerns about the phantom menace but that is a masterpiece by comparison. The only benefit to having seen this movie is that I now know to avoid the new star wars movies in the future.
